title: HW7 Q2: RNNs for Last Name Classification (Coding)

comments.content: <document version="2.0"><paragraph>Problem context: </paragraph><paragraph>This is one of the programming assignments for this week. This is also an opportunity to get you to reflect a bit on the social implications of deep learning technologies. As people being trained to use these transformative technologies, you should think a bit about such things. We could just give you problems and applications that are completely sanitized from social implications, but the underlying technological possibilities are very much something that can impact people's lives. Consequently, we wanted a place where you could explicitly engage in that reflection using a dataset that is widely available.</paragraph></document>
comments.document:
Problem context: 

This is one of the programming assignments for this week. This is also an opportunity to get you to reflect a bit on the social implications of deep learning technologies. As people being trained to use these transformative technologies, you should think a bit about such things. We could just give you problems and applications that are completely sanitized from social implications, but the underlying technological possibilities are very much something that can impact people's lives. Consequently, we wanted a place where you could explicitly engage in that reflection using a dataset that is widely available.
